      Here is a curated list of my personal and professional projects.
      Each project reflects my hands-on experience in system software, storage drivers, and automation tools.

      Cherry Utility

      A personal CLI toolkit for task automation, backup scripts, and development workflows.

      Tech Stack: C++11, Bash, CLI, Linux

      SSINK

      An image-processing pipeline for OLED inkjet printing quality prediction with multithreaded simulation.

      Tech Stack: C++, OpenCV, Threading

      NVMe Driver

      Out-of-tree Linux NVMe driver extension with multi-PF/NS architecture redesign and scalable debug interface.

      Tech Stack: Linux Kernel, PCIe, NVMe, Debug
